column2: Choose what action you would like to perform. State of character: Hit points left: [Root.duel_hp.GetValue]\n Max hit points: [Root.duel_max_hp.GetValue]
Try to use your weapon or shield to block the blows that may come
Look for weakness in enemy defence and prepare yourself
The sound of clashing steel rings through the air!\n Damage dealt: [From.duel_dmg.GetValue]\n Damage recieved: [Root.duel_dmg.GetValue]
The sound of clashing steel rings through the air!\n Damage dealt: [From.duel_dmg.GetValue]\n Damage recieved: [Root.duel_dmg.GetValue]
You exchanged the blows with your enemy, dealing them [From.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage, while receiving [Root.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage.
You exchanged the blows with your enemy, dealing them [From.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage, while receiving [Root.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage.

Your enemy launches a depsperate attack. Too weak to parry their blow, you feel the steel of their blade slice you open, recieving [Root.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage. Warm blood stains your clothing and you fall to the ground, the life draining from your body. Hearing your enemy's roar of triumph, you give in to the icy grip of death, contemplating the mistakes you have made.

As you press your advantage upon your enemy, you can feel your blows sapping their strength. Launching your final attack, you deal them [From.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage and cut through their armor, severing their torso in two. Letting out a ferocuious bellow, you sginal your victory to the onlookers and challenge another to take the place of your opponent. None step forward.
You managed to escape from certain death at the hands of your enemy.
I must get away from here!
